name: Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings.
– all drawings are the latest revision.
Record of conformity - Drawings and drawing registers
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Prior to Franna lift, the below shall be completed:
○ Certification of any lifting lugs/beams/spreaders (if required)
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Submission and approval of the following:
Record of conformity - This ITP signed Aconex Reference
Acceptance Criteria - Pole installed level as per manufacturers specification and design drawings.
○ Rag bolt nuts secured firmly and torqued as per manufacturers specification.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Avionics Checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Install cabling, isolating switch, surge arrestor, earthing and termination box
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Avionics Checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Install and connect LED lamps
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Avionics Checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Windsock & Barell installed and secured to pole, ensuring the windsock is installed 6500mm from the ground as per MOS139
○ Stainless steel bird spikes installed to floodlight mounting arms
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Demonstrate the lowering of pole and making sure the mast assembly isn't damaged when lowering.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria - Perform relevant cable tests prior to energization (not limited to):
○ Confirm all test measurements are within AS3000 tolerances.
Record of conformity - Certificate of Electrical Safety (Non- Prescribed) (CES), Avionics ITC
○ Provide 7 days notice to Principals Rep to attend
○ IWDI shall be fully tested by continuous operation for not less than 24 hrs as a completed system prior to acceptance. The IWDI shall illuminate properly during each portion of the test.
○ LED Lamps to be tested as per MOS139, with each reading between 100 to 600 lux within the testing grid.
Record of conformity - This ITP signed Test Results, Letter of Conformity Avionics ITC

Acceptance Criteria - From an observer’s standing position on ground that is level with the base of the pole there should be no glare at a range of 25 m or more. The assessment need only be made from those directions likely to be viewed from landing, taking-off or taxiing aircraft.
○ Qualified individual includes an electrical engineer or a licensed electrician
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed Avionics ITC
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
